title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the basics of computer science and programming
instructorBio: Professor of Computer Science at MIT with 20+ years of experience
whatYoullLearn: Core programming concepts and problem-solving techniques

assignments.title: Hello World Program
assignments.description: Get familiar with your environment and basic syntax by printing text to the console.
assignments.instructions: Write a program that prints Hello World

assignments.title: Calculator Application
assignments.description: Practice functions and control flow by implementing a CLI calculator with basic operations.

assignments.title: Data Analysis Project
assignments.description: Work with real data to perform cleaning, aggregation, and simple visualization.
assignments.instructions: Analyze a CSV dataset using Python

projectsDetails.title: To-Do List App
projectsDetails.description: Create a CRUD to-do app with local storage

projectsDetails.title: Web Scraper
projectsDetails.description: Scrape data and export to CSV

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Master the fundamentals of machine learning and AI
instructorBio: Co-founder of Coursera, former head of Google Brain and Baidu AI

assignments.title: Linear Regression Implementation
assignments.description: Code linear regression to understand gradient descent and cost functions.

assignments.title: Neural Network from Scratch
assignments.description: Build and train a simple neural network to internalize backpropagation.
assignments.instructions: Build a multi-layer NN without frameworks

assignments.title: Model Optimization Challenge
assignments.description: Experiment with learning rates and optimizers to improve validation metrics.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Complete guide to modern web development
instructorBio: Senior full-stack developer with 12 years of experience
whatYoullLearn: Build responsive websites with HTML5 and CSS3
Master JavaScript fundamentals and ES6+ features
Create dynamic UIs with React and Redux
Work with APIs and asynchronous JavaScript
Best practices for modern web development

assignments.title: Build a Landing Page
assignments.description: Apply HTML/CSS fundamentals to craft a responsive landing page.

assignments.title: JavaScript Calculator
assignments.description: Reinforce JS basics with DOM and event handling.

assignments.title: Interactive Todo App
assignments.description: Manage state and lists with filters and persistence.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Master essential data structures and algorithms
instructorBio: Professor of Computer Science at UC Berkeley with 15 years of teaching experience

assignments.title: Dynamic Array
assignments.description: Practice memory-resizable arrays and amortized analysis.

assignments.title: LinkedList Ops
assignments.description: Explore pointer manipulation and list operations.

assignments.title: Tree Traversals
assignments.description: Implement and compare DFS variants and BFS.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Learn AWS cloud services and architecture
instructorBio: AWS certified Solutions Architect with 8 years at Amazon
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of web servers and databases
whatYoullLearn: Master AWS core services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
Prepare for AWS Solutions Architect certification

assignments.title: Deploy Web on EC2
assignments.description: Provision and harden a Linux instance to host a simple web app.
assignments.instructions: Launch and secure an EC2 web server

assignments.title: S3 Static Website
assignments.description: Use S3 and CloudFront to deliver a static site efficiently.
assignments.instructions: Host static site on S3 + CloudFront

assignments.title: Serverless API
assignments.description: Design an event-driven API with Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.

assignments.title: Marketing Strategy

assignments.title: SEO Audit
